verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump confidant Roger Stone] [V: held] [ARG1: a secret meeting with a Russian operative who offered “ dirt ” on former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton prior to the 2016 presidential election] , a new report from the Washington Post revealed .

President Donald Trump confidant Roger Stone held a secret meeting with [ARG0: a Russian operative] [R-ARG0: who] [V: offered] “ [ARG1: dirt] ” [ARG1: on former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton] [ARGM-TMP: prior to the 2016 presidential election] , a new report from the Washington Post revealed .

President Donald Trump confidant Roger Stone held a secret meeting with a Russian operative who offered “ dirt ” on former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton prior to the 2016 presidential election , [ARG0: a new report from the Washington Post] [V: revealed] .
